Osejs.Information.Title: Ballistics and Orbits
Osejs.Information.Author: Cleon Teunissen
Osejs.Information.Abstract: Additional information about the simulation is available at the author's website: http://www.cleonis.nl

Variable.Name: omegaSystem
Variable.Comment: input variable - system rotation rate in radians per unit of time

Variable.Name: thetaSystem
Variable.Comment: input variable - azimuthal position of the system as a whole

Variable.Name: G
Variable.Comment: input variable - gravitational acceleration factor. Here, 'g' does not represent 'G' as in Newton's law of gravity. Here, 'g' is just a convenient multiplication factor

Variable.Name: launchLatitude
Variable.Comment: input variable - latitude from which the projectile is launched, in degrees

Variable.Name: launchHeight
Variable.Comment: input variable - height above the surface of the point of release/launch

Variable.Name: launchSpeed
Variable.Comment: input variable - the speed of the projectile at the moment of release/launch

Variable.Name: launchElevation
Variable.Comment: input variable - verticle angle at which the object is launched

Variable.Name: launchDirection
Variable.Comment: input variable -

Variable.Name: cosineLaunchLatitudeRad
Variable.Comment: input variable - cosine of the latitude

Variable.Name: sineLaunchLatitudeRad
Variable.Comment: input variable -

Variable.Name: cosineLaunchElevationRad
Variable.Comment: input variable -

Variable.Name: sineLaunchElevationRad
Variable.Comment: input variable -

Variable.Name: cosineLaunchDirectionRad
Variable.Comment: input variable -

Variable.Name: sineLaunchDirectionRad
Variable.Comment: input variable -

Variable.Name: vxEquator
Variable.Comment: auxillary variable - velociity in x-direction if launch would be at equator

Variable.Name: vzEquator
Variable.Comment: auxillary variable - velociity in z-direction if launch would be at equator

Variable.Name: vyRotation
Variable.Comment: auxillary variable - velociity component in y-direction due to coroting motion

Variable.Name: vyLaunch
Variable.Comment: auxillary variable - velociity component in y-direction due to launch

Variable.Name: x
Variable.Comment: dynamic variable - x-position

Variable.Name: vx
Variable.Comment: dynamic variable - velocity in x-direction

Variable.Name: y
Variable.Comment: dynamic variable - y-position

Variable.Name: vy
Variable.Comment: dynamic variable - velocity in y-direction

Variable.Name: z
Variable.Comment: dynamic variable - z-position

Variable.Name: vz
Variable.Comment: dynamic variable - velocity in y-direction

Variable.Name: distanceToCenterUnit
Variable.Comment: output variable - The height above the planet's geometrical center

Variable.Name: altitude
Variable.Comment: output variable - Height above the surface of the planet

Variable.Name: xGroundtrack
Variable.Comment: output variable

Variable.Name: yGroundtrack
Variable.Comment: output variable

Variable.Name: zGroundtrack
Variable.Comment: output variable

Variable.Name: cosineTheta
Variable.Comment: auxillary variable - the cosine of the current azimuth

Variable.Name: sineTheta
Variable.Comment: auxillary variable - the sine of the current azimuth

Variable.Name: xCoro
Variable.Comment: output variable - x-position with respect to the co-rotating coordinate system

Variable.Name: yCoro
Variable.Comment: output variable - y-position with respect to the co-rotating coordinate system

Variable.Name: xGroundtrackCoro
Variable.Comment: output variable

Variable.Name: yGroundtrackCoro
Variable.Comment: output variable

Variable.Name: rotation
Variable.Comment: The object that rotates the sphere in the inertial view

Variable.Name: rotationTangent
Variable.Comment: The object that rotates the great circle that is tangent to the launch latitude

Variable.Name: instantPlay
Variable.Comment: If instantPlay == true then start play of simulation instantly after entering new value in input field

Variable.Name: impact
Variable.Comment: true if the simulation must halt if the projectile touches the Earth's surface, false if the simulation is to continu playing

PreliminaryCode.Code: double ds = x*x + y*y + z*z; double den = Math.sqrt(ds)*ds;

Content.Comment: den = denominator The code for the denominator is in the 'Prelim' panel

Osejs.View.Creation.Element.Property: "Reinitialize view using the current user inputs"
"Halt the simulation when the object crosses the surface"
"Show the tower that the object is released from"
"Show the great circle that is tangent to the current launch latitude"
"Show window with extra settings and presets"
"Instantplay: after changing input value play the simulation instantly"
"發射了彈道導彈幾乎直線上升，在向西方向"
"預設的輸入值，地球靜止軌道"
"從高處丟下東西，看是否落回原點"
